attributes.review: this app is the slowest and most glitchiest app. and all the stuff on it is FAKE. it’s not a good app at all. it will tear up your phone bc of how slow and glitchy it is. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and it took so long to download also whoever downloads this app good luck because it is really bad

attributes.review: I got this app just to see what Trump had to say for himself. Clearly he has no compassion or empathy and doesn’t deserve to have this app in the store.✨
attributes.title: I wasn’t a fan

attributes.review: I have no words of how terrible this app is. Very disgusting. I almost went blind. That is not ok. All the picture of the man 👨 is blinding. I would not recommend!
attributes.title: Disgusting ✨🧚

attributes.review: the moment I downloaded this app the flying dutchman’s hand came through my phone and choke slammed me!!!! this is the worst app to ever exist and i no longer have a femur

attributes.review: Terrible because I never received the food for my caterpillars. How dare they?! I was supposed to get it a week ago!!!! My caterpillar died because of Trump! One star!
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: the color combination makes me SICK to me stomach. it took two weeks to download 🙄 the app beat me up, stole my first child, AND called my mom ugly. DO NOT recommend 🥱

attributes.review: Hate this app a lo. Don’t recommend, for it it’s useless and does not help the community at all. I also feel like it violates my rights as a person
